short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace English with Korean to advance your duolingo vocabulary!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In line with Duolingo's vocabulary levels, this extension replaces English words with Korean words to help you get used to using these words in everyday contexts. 

The real reason why people learn languages slowly is because they don't use it on a regular basis. This extension allows you to seamlessly integrate a new language into your everyday life, one step at a time. 

This makes your language learning:
• achievable
• easy and subconscious
• contextual
• constant

Happy learning!
